article.title: Overview
article.para: CMView is an intervative contact map visualization and analysis tool. It will be available for download soon. If you are interested in a preview version, please contact stehr@molgen.mpg.de.

listitem.para: Combined contact map and 3D structure view
Various im- and export options: PDB files, Online PDB, Image export, CASP prediction format and others
Calculation of contact maps with user-defined contact definitions
Integration with PyMol for feature-rich 3D molecular visualization
Interactive selection of single or multiple contacts and visualization in 3D
Structure and contact map comparison using built-in sequence or structural alignments
Various contact map analysis features including distance map, difference map, contact density
Available for Unix, Windows, MacOS and other platforms

itemizedlist.title: Types of analyses that can be done with CMView include:

listitem.para: Assessing similarites and differences between structure or contact predictions
Studying interactions between secondary structure elements
Visualization of conformational changes in 3D and contact map space
